ot) root and Canola oil, Borago officinalis seed oil, Pelargonium graveolens flower/ leaf/ stem oil, Hippophae rhamnoides oil, Tocopherol, Fusanus spicatus (sandalwood) Oil, Jasminum Grandiflorum Absolute, Citrus aurantium Flower Oil, Vitis vinifera (Grapeseed) oil

Warnings: For external use only. Use on local areas only. Avoid contact with eyes a
book: 1973-Way of Will Anti-Aging Face Serum (2020 formulation)

chunk:
contact with eyes and mucous membranes. Avoid contact with open skin. Always skin test on a small area before use. Discontinue if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. Store below 21C / 70F.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
